JSON_README_SETUP_PARAM.max_ping_attempt: number of maximum count of target that allowed to ping, i.e 20. format NUMERIC
JSON_README_SETUP_PARAM.disable_protocol: protocol to be disabled when ping reach its maximum, i.e icmp, udp, and tcp. format STRING ARRAY
JSON_README_SETUP_PARAM.disable_tcp_port: tcp port to be blocked when tcp protocol is selected to be disabled, i.e 80, 443, and 23. format NUMERIC ARRAY
JSON_README_SETUP_PARAM.disable_udp_port: udp port to be blocked when udp protocol is selected to be disabled. i.e 53. format NUMERIC ARRAY
JSON_README_SETUP_PARAM.detection_method: ways for iptables rule to specify the source, i.e ip or mac. format STRING
JSON_README_SETUP_PARAM.rule_chain_match: ways for iptables to chain the rule for executiion, i.e DROP, ALLOW, FORWARD, or REJECT. format STRING
